div.p: You can find the April 22 CTA Board Meeting Agenda and login information here: http://www.ctachargers.org/board-meeting-public-posting-for-april-22-2020

Tomorrow at 2pm is our weekly Senior Zoom. Mrs. Rose will be communicating the expectations for Senior Project. Please note you will need the password to enter.
